connections: RJ-45 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX, 3.5 mm Speaker, 3.5mm MIC, DC Power jack, AC power terminal block, BNC analog video output
housing: Vandal-proof: Metal base and polycarbonate transparent cover, weather-proof IP66-rated housing
lens: Vari-Focus board lens, F 1.4 / f=3.3~12 mm
protocols: IPv4, TCP/IP, UDP, RTP, RTSP, HTTP, ICMP,FTP, SMTP, DHCP, PPPoE, UPnP and IGMP
security: Multi-level user access with password protection
audio: 2-Way Audio, external Mic input, external speaker output
